SA13bsa060_u:1_0: kaumārye paṭhyatāṃ vidyā śaitye saṃpālyatāṃ ca gauḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:1_1: kṣettraṃ ca karṣyatāṃ pītaṃ trayaḥ suphalahetavaḥ // 1 //
SA13bsa060_u:1_2: gate 'pi vayasi grāhyā vidyā sarvātmanā budhaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:1_6: guṇini guṇajño ramate nāguṇaśīlasya guṇini paritoṣaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:1_11: guṇāḥ kurvanti dūtatvaṃ dūre 'pi basatāṃ satām /
SA13bsa060_u:1_13: vidvatvaṃ ca nṛpatvaṃ ca naiva tulyaṃ kadācana /
SA13bsa060_u:1_14: svadeśe pūjyate rājā vidvān sarvatra pūjyate // 8 //
SA13bsa060_u:1_15: alpastu kālo vividhāśca vidhā ḥ simāyuṣo yā kiyatī? na buddhā /
SA13bsa060_u:1_16: haṃsā labhante ca yathā payo 'dbhyas tathaiva tatvaṃ labhatāṃ ca yattat // 9 //
SA13bsa060_u:1_18: vicchedānna hi cāntaraṃ kimapi tat tyājyaṃ na kiṃ tatsthalam /
SA13bsa060_u:1_19: vaivaśyāddhi viyogato manasi jāyante vidhātā ati
SA13bsa060_u:1_20: tatsthānaṃ yadi hīyate sahajataḥ syāccātiśāntiḥ sukham //
SA13bsa060_u:2_2: prapañcā yatnaoto heyāḥ saṃsargaḥ kriyatāṃ satām /
SA13bsa060_u:2_6: udayantvamūni subahūni mahāmahāṃsi cando cando 'pyalaṃ bhuvanamaṇḍalamaṇḍanāya /
SA13bsa060_u:2_7: sūryādūte na tadudeti na cāstameti yenoditena dinamastamitena rātriḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_8: yadudeti vinā sūrya tejasvi tanna jāyate /
SA13bsa060_u:2_11: mūdhni vā sarvalokasya śīryate vana eva vā // 16 /
SA13bsa060_u:2_12: vāṇi kaṭhorā bhaṇitā hi duṣṭairyā sarparūpā sujanān hinasti /
SA13bsa060_u:2_13: te bheṣajaṃ kṣāntimayaṃ ca prajñāṃ saṃsevya cintārahitā bhavanti // 17 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_15: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoḥ kiṃ nodeti punaḥ śaśī // 18 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_18: vanāni dahato vahneḥ sakhā bhavati mārutaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_19: sa eva dīpanāśāya kṛśe kasyāsti sauhṛdam // 20 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_24: dūrastho 'pi samīpastho yo yasya manasi sthitaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_26: pareṣāṃ vaibhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā mano yasya prakupyati /
SA13bsa060_u:2_27: na tasyārthopalabdhistu citaṃ puṇyaṃ ca naśyati // 24 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_28: rāgopamaṃ nāsti malaṃ hi loke īrṣyopamā nāsti ca kāpi hāniḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_29: yāñcāsamo nāsti ca ko 'pi bandhurdānopamo nāsti ca mitravargaḥ // 25 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_30: kṣudhāsamā nāsti śarīravedanā cintāsamā nāsti śarīraśoṣaṇā /
SA13bsa060_u:2_31: guṇaiḥ samā nāsti śarīrabhūṣaṇā kṣāntyā samaṃ nāsti śarīravarmaṃ vai // 26 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_32: dhanena kiṃ kṣudrajanasya mitraiḥ kiṃ vañcakasyāpi ca matsarasya /
SA13bsa060_u:2_33: kiṃ hānidasyātiguṇagrahaiśca kiṃ vā vipattau vimukhātmajena // 27 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_34: sarvathā svahitamācaraṇīyaṃ kiṃ kariṣyati jano bahujalpaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_35: bidyate hi na sa kaścidupāyaḥ sarvalokaparitoṣakaro yaḥ // 28 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_36: prasaṅgasyānukūlo yaḥ prajña eva sa pālayet /
SA13bsa060_u:2_37: satyāsatye ca maitridveṣau kuryāt svaparaiḥ saha // 29 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_38: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvamapi ghnataḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_39: krodhameva tu yo hanti tena sarve dviṣo hatāḥ // 30 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_43: prajñā hrāso na yāvaddhi tāvatkuryāt svayaṃ hitam // 32 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_44: vyabhicāreṣvāsattaḥ rājā tasya hi nirakṣaro mantri /
SA13bsa060_u:2_45: tadā dhanāśā kutra rakṣyā asavaḥ prayatnena // 33 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_49: kākaścālayet pākaṃ vastūnāṃ tatra kā kathā // 35 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_51: puṣpaṃ puṣpaṃ vicinvīta mūlocchedaṃ na kārayet // 36 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_52: valmīkaṃ madhujātaṃ ca śuklapakṣe ca candramāḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_54: hīnatā yācane yatra syāttatra na ca yācyatām /
SA13bsa060_u:2_55: kāmaṃ hi na bhavedindro himājjīvati tittariḥ // 38 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_56: mayūra ! grīṣmasya tu tāpayukta āśāyutaḥ khasya jale bhavestvam /
SA13bsa060_u:2_57: kaṇṭhantu no nāmaya gauraveṇa nīre taḍāgasya tu dūṣitasya // 39 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_58: siṃho balī hariṇaraktapāmāṃsabhojī saṃvatsareṇa kurute ratimekavāram /
SA13bsa060_u:2_59: yo gardabhaḥ khalu rajaḥkaṇamātrabhojī kāmī bhavedanudinaṃ vada ko 'tra hetuḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_60: / 40 // sarpāḥ pibanti pavanaṃ na ca durbalāste śuṣkaistṛṇairvanagajā balino bhavanti /
SA13bsa060_u:2_61: kandaiḥ phalairmunivarā gamayanti kālam saṃtoṣa eva puruṣasya paraṃ nidhānam /
SA13bsa060_u:2_62: sa śobhate puṣpitapuṣpavacca sumaṇḍitaṃ yasya mukhaṃ suvarṇaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_63: anakṣaraṃ yasya mukhaṃ bhavecvet tannetravaktre bhubi chidravacca // 42 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_64: muktāmaṇibhyāṃ ca hi gardabhasya kiṃ śūkarasya priyabhojanena /
SA13bsa060_u:2_65: andhasyadīptyā badhirasya gītaimūrkhasya dharmeṇa kimasti kṛtyam // 43 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_70: kṣatiṃ bihāya yenāpi prayogeṇa hitasya kim /
SA13bsa060_u:2_74: kāmāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na lajjā kṣudhāturāṇāṃ na balaṃ na tejaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_75: rogāturāṇāṃ na sukhaṃ na nidrā mārgāturāṇāṃ na bhayaṃ na vīryam // 48 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_76: dhanalipsuḥ suhrit tyājyā bhāryā ca vyabhicāriṇī /
SA13bsa060_u:2_77: adharmī ca nṛpaḥ krūro mantrī piśuna eva ca // 49 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_78: kupradeśo hi durvyavasāyo duṣṭo 'tha vai suhṛt /
SA13bsa060_u:2_79: baidyo 'dakṣo 'pi duḥsevyam vastu heyā ime 'pi ca // 50 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_85: aho ! susadṛśī ceṣṭā tulāyaṣṭeḥ khalasya ca // 53 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_86: yathā bāryo na laśunasya gandhaḥ kastūrikācandanacandrasaṃjñaiḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_87: tathā na vāryā varaśāstraśikṣābhyāsena duṣṭasya ca duṣṭatāpi // 54 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_89: maṇinā bhūṣitaḥ sarpaḥ kimasau na bhayaṅkaraḥ // 55 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_91: nyūne śaradi nīre hi nadīṃ sarve taranti ca // 56 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_94: duṣṭā narā bhṛtyagaṇo 'vamānī praśikṣitā naiva hayāḥ kubhāryā /
SA13bsa060_u:2_95: pratāḍanenaiva bhavanti namrāḥ sukarmayogyā na kadāpi caite // 58 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_96: vṛthā vṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya vṛthā tṛptasya bhojanam /
SA13bsa060_u:2_97: vṛthā dānaṃ samarthasya vṛthā hīnasya satkṛtiḥ // 59 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_98: padmāni satputramukhe lasanti rohanti nūnaṃ kulaṭāsutasya /
SA13bsa060_u:2_99: viṣasya patrāṇi yathā karoti duṣkarma yo vai labhate phalantat // 60 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_100: abhracchāyā khale prītiḥ siddhamannaṃ ca yoṣitaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_102: śuṣkaṃ māṃsaṃ striyo vṛddhā madyaṃ ca taruṇaṃ dadhi /
SA13bsa060_u:2_103: nakte bhojo divā svāpaḥ ṣaḍete prāṇahāriṇaḥ // 62 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_106: kāntāviyogaḥ svajanāpamāno ṛṇasya śeṣaḥ kunarasya sevā /
SA13bsa060_u:2_108: karmī hyalābhī balino 'pakartā darpī ca bhikṣurhyadhanaḥ sukhārthī /
SA13bsa060_u:2_116: yācakaḥ svādubhoji ca darpī bhikṣāparo bhavet /
SA13bsa060_u:2_118: sakṛjjalpanti rājānaḥ āryo hi dṛśyate sakṛt /
SA13bsa060_u:2_131: na dṛśyate tena gṛhe tu patnyāḥ kāmādimithyācaraṇaṃ kukṛtam // 76 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_133: pāre gatasya kiṃ nāvā kāntayā kiṃ virāgiṇaḥ // 77 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_135: gūḍhe vacasi bhojye 'sti prīti pṛthagjanasya ca // 78 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_136: śaile śaile na māṇikyaṃ mīne mīne na mauktim /
SA13bsa060_u:2_137: sādhavo he na sarvatra candanaṃ na vane vane // 79 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_138: haṃso na bhāti caturo bakayūthamadhye gomāyumaṇḍalagato na vibhāti siṃhaḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_139: jātyo na bhāti turagaḥ kharayūthamadhye vidvān na bhāti puruṣeṣu nirakṣareṣu // 80 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_143: vinītāya ca śāntāya janāya kā sahiṣṇutā // 82 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_149: aṅkamāruhya suptasya hantuḥ kiṃ nāma pauruṣam // 85 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_150: kaumāre pitarau pātaḥ bhartrī rakṣati yauvane /
SA13bsa060_u:2_152: āsaktirna bhaveddyāvat tāvattu guṇa eva saḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_157: bālaḥ payasā dagdho dadhyapi phūtkṛtya bhakṣayati // 89 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_164: śiṣṭā na gṛhṇanti purā pratijñāṃ gṛhṇanti cet te kaṭhinapratijñām /
SA13bsa060_u:2_165: aṅgikṛtāṃ tāṃ paripālayanti pāṣāṇarekhāmiva te tadānīm // 93 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_166: prāpnoti vittaṃ hyadhamo ti kiñcid garvī pareṣāmavamānanāyām /
SA13bsa060_u:2_167: saṃjāyate labdhadhanaḥ sumartyaḥ supakvadhānyena samaṃ vinamraḥ // 94 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_172: guṇā guṇajñeṣu guṇā bhavanti te nirguṇaṃ prāpya bhavanti doṣāḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_173: susvādu toyāḥ prabhavanti nadyaḥ samudramāsādya bhavantyapeyāḥ // 97 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_176: alpā dṛḍhā ye mṛdubhāṣiṇaśca tebhyo 'vadhānaṃ karaṇīyameva /
SA13bsa060_u:2_177: niryāti sūryaḥ saghanāddhi meghāt syāt tatprakāśastu tadātitīkṣṇaḥ // 99 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_178: śāntipriyāḥ syuḥ khalu yauvane 'pi vaiduṣya evaṃ vinatā bhaveyuḥ /
SA13bsa060_u:2_183: upekṣate tatra sukhaṃ na ceha janaḥ prapātastha ivāsti cāndhaḥ // 102 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_184: ye kleśarogiṇo bhuktvā na ca saddharmabheṣajam /
SA13bsa060_u:2_185: pramattā viṣayāsaktā bhavābdhiṃ na taranti te // 103 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_189: śvastanaṃ cādya kuryācca pūrva madhyāhnikaṃ varam // 105 //
SA13bsa060_u:2_193: sato jīvanamanto vā varaṃ tvākheṭakasya na // 107 //
SA13bsa060_u:4_0: gātheyaṃ bhāratīyopādhyāyavinayacandreṇa bhoṭadeśīya lokacakṣu bhikṣuṇā dharmaprajñenānūditā nirṇītāceti /
